label: 後撰集
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: Gosenshū contains 1,426 poems by some 200 authors, of whom Ki no Tsurayuki (884-946), with seventy-seven, is the best represented (p. 79n). [紀貫之]
